thread.title: Shay Mitchell's Secret to Looking Fit? This Insane Gym Routine
thread.title_full: Shay Mitchell's Secret to Looking Fit? This Insane Gym Routine

author: Dominique Astorino
title: Shay Mitchell's Secret to Looking Fit? This Insane Gym Routine
text:
Shay Mitchell's Secret to Looking Fit? This Insane Gym Routine February 21, 2017 by Dominique Astorino 38 Shares 
We've known that Shay Mitchell is into fitness for a while — she's done a half marathon, loves hiking . . . but we didn't realize she goes into full beast mode in the gym. Check it out for yourself. A post shared by Shay Mitchell (@shaym) on Feb 20, 2017 at 5:45pm PST 
The combination of challenging balance work using the ball and Bosu, plus plyometrics, and weighted resistance training is a total body workout — and that's just her Monday session! 
Shay's been working with her personal trainer, "J" ( @j.crvz on Instagram), who appears to have a packed-with-A-listers clientele in LA, including Victoria's Secret models. And we can see why — that routine is incredible and the results are really speaking for themselves. Related:
